Pixiu_Beta.get_exchange_wei (/unique_chucks/28/0xbef44157a4afbfcce76db29353b6c103a03ed803.sol#359-383) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nowTime >= time1 && nowTime <= time2 (/unique_chucks/28/0xbef44157a4afbfcce76db29353b6c103a03ed803.sol#376-381)

Pixiu_Beta.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xbef44157a4afbfcce76db29353b6c103a03ed803.sol#204-205)
Pixiu_Beta.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xbef44157a4afbfcce76db29353b6c103a03ed803.sol#174)
